text: انى اخاف عليكم عذاب يوم عظيم

translations.translation: I fear the punishment of a terrible day for you.
I fear for you the chastisement of an Awesome Day."
I am afraid that you will suffer the torment of the Day of Judgment."
“Indeed I fear upon you the punishment of a Great Day.”
Verily, I fear for you the torment of a Great Day."
Surely I fear for you the chastisement of a grievous day
Indeed, I fear for you the chastisement of a dreadful day.'
Lo! I fear for you the retribution of an awful day.
indeed, I fear for you the torment of an awful day."
Verily I fear for you the torment of a Mighty Day.
Indeed I fear for you the punishment of a tremendous day.’
Truly I fear for you the Penalty of a Great Day."
Verily, I fear for you the torment of a Great Day."
Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a dreadful Day'
I fear for you the punishment of an awesome Day.”
Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."
[26:135] Indeed I fear for you the chastisement of a tremendous day’, in this world and in the Hereafter should you disobey me.
(Lo! I fear for you) I know you will be visited by (the retribution of an awful day) in the Fire, if you do not repent of disbelief, idolatry and idol worship.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِنِّيۤ } من كمال عطفي ومرحمتي { أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ } من كمال تعنتكم واستكباركم { عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ } [الشعراء: 135] أي: نزول عذاب الله وأنواع عقوباته فيه
